TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorService Implements IDisposable
public ref class BehaviorService sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 在设计器中管理用户界面。

span.span: Manages user interface in the designer.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是创建，它将透明窗口添加到设计器框架。When the is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame. 可以然后使用此窗口来呈现用户界面元素，名为对象，以及捕获所有鼠标消息。The can then use this window to render user interface elements, called objects, as well as catch all mouse messages. 这样一来，可以控制设计器的行为。In this way, the can control designer behavior. 类支持行为堆栈，其上的推入对象。The class supports a behavior stack, onto which objects can be pushed. 通过透明窗口截获的一条消息时可以发送邮件至堆栈的顶部。When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the can send the message to the at the top of the stack. 这使不同的用户界面模式，具体取决于当前压入。This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed . 用来呈现所有对象，如选择边框，大小调整句柄和智能标记。The is used to render all objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags. 还控制许多设计时行为，例如使用对齐线、 拖动和选择。The also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建您自己基于用户的单击操作的响应的类。The following code example demonstrates how to create your own based class that responds to user clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发其前后的事件启动拖放操作。The raises the event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 装饰器窗口是一个驻留在设计器的帧之上的透明窗口。The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame. 通过使用此窗口截获所有消息。This window is used by the to intercept all messages. 它还可以在其上绘制一个统一的画布作为。It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过点击测试通常完成推送捕获行为。Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested . 如果一个行为调用方法和鼠标捕获已丢失，该行为的调用方法。If a behavior calls the method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's method is called.
